KMF-1.amount_of_each_solvent: 27 mL for dissolving Al2(SO4)3·18H2O, additional 27 mL for mixture solution with 2,5-pyrroledicarboxylic and NaOH
KMF-1.equipment: Hydrothermal synthesis under atmospheric reflux condition
KMF-1.washing_method: Purified with deionized water and ethanol

additional_information.hydrothermal_stability: Stable in boiling water and in a wide range of acidic and basic aqueous solutions (1 < pH < 12) at room temperature for 1 day
